title: Lesbian Romance: Returning Customer
description: Lesbian Romance Megan is a workaholic who spend most of her time at the office or with her live-in boyfriend, Phillip. An altercation with him lands her in the arms of a new friend, D. But there is something different about this woman. Something else. Megan quickly develops feelings, not sure what these are. Confused by her newfound sexual desires, Megan must decide which relationship to fight her safe relationship with Phillip or her passionate relationship with D?
author: S.B. Sheeran
